PageTitle: display ip fib slot all-vpn-instance statistics
FuncDef: The display ip fib slot all-vpn-instance statistics command displays statistics about the IPv4 route FIB tables of all VPNs on a specified board. The display ip fib slot all-vpn-instance statistics command displays statistics about the IPv4 route FIB tables of all VPNs on a specified board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 23 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display ip fib slot 1 all-vpn-instance statistics
